flavorText: "Finding a hidden patch of glowberries is almost as joyful as eating them. Almost."\n—Ms. Bumbleflower

name: Intrepid Rabbit
originalText: Offspring {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell. If you do, when this creature enters, create a 1/1 token copy of it.)\nWhen this creature enters, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText: "I'll light the way, but we must walk it together."

name: Jackdaw Savior
originalText: Flying\nWhenever Jackdaw Savior or another creature you control with flying dies, return another target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Jolly Gerbils
originalText: Whenever you give a gift, draw a card.
flavorText: "With all the chaos going around, we thought it might be the perfect time to take a break and have a nice picnic. Would you like to join us?"

name: Lifecreed Duo
originalText: Flying\nWhenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life.
flavorText: "Why are you eating upside down?" asked the bird. "Why are you eating upside up?" replied the bat.

name: Mabel's Mettle
originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText: "You stole a child from its nest," Mabel accused. "The only calamity I see here is you."

name: Mouse Trapper
originalText: Flash\nValiant — Whenever Mouse Trapper becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavorText: "I'm not here to hurt you, but I will stop you from hurting others."

name: Nettle Guard
originalText: Valiant — Whenever Nettle Guard becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.\n{1}, Sacrifice Nettle Guard: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Parting Gust
originalText: Gift a tapped Fish (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they create a tapped 1/1 blue Fish creature token before its other effects.)\nExile target nontoken creature. If the gift wasn't promised, return that creature to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Pileated Provisioner
originalText: Flying\nWhen Pileated Provisioner enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control without flying.
flavorText: Aerial supporters train for years to make sure the weapons they drop land in the hands of mice and not on their heads.

name: Rabbit Response
originalText: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. If you control a Rabbit, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)
flavorText: You never fight just one rabbitfolk. They bring the strength of their burrow to battle with them.

name: Repel Calamity
originalText: Destroy target creature with power or toughness 4 or greater.
flavorText: The living seasons come to grow, to burn, to wither, and to freeze. As natural as it is for the Calamity Beasts to live, it is just as natural for them to die.

name: Salvation Swan
originalText: Flash\nFlying\nWhenever Salvation Swan or another Bird you control enters, exile up to one target creature you control without flying. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a flying counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Season of the Burrow
originalText:
Choose up to five {Paw Print} worth of modes. You may choose the same mode more than once.
{Paw Print} — Create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token.
{Paw Print}{Paw Print} — Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
{Paw Print}{Paw Print}{Paw Print} — Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it.

name: Seasoned Warrenguard
originalText: Whenever Seasoned Warrenguard attacks while you control a token, Seasoned Warrenguard gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: Never underestimate what a rabbit can do with a root vegetable and some moxie.

name: Shrike Force
originalText: Flying, double strike, vigilance
flavorText: "I've trained every one of them in aerial maneuvers, talon strikes, and dive precision. They are the top of my class, and they may surpass me one day."\n—Quickwing, master flyer

name: Sonar Strike
originalText: Sonar Strike deals 4 damage to target attacking, blocking, or tapped creature. You gain 3 life if you control a Bat.
flavorText: Valley's midnight clerics channel the life force of other animals into blinding strikes and searing shrieks.

name: Star Charter
originalText: Flying\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you gained or lost life this turn, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Starfall Invocation
originalText: Gift a card (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they draw a card before its other effects.)\nDestroy all creatures. If the gift was promised, return a creature card put into your graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.
flavorText: Nothing lurks in the purity of the moon's light.

name: Thistledown Players
originalText: Whenever Thistledown Players attacks, untap target nonland permanent.
flavorText: "In hand, a sword to slay the frightful beast; in heart, these words to soothe our frightened kin."\n—*Lily and the Ember Seed*

name: Warren Elder
originalText: {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Brambleguard Captain's power.

originalText: First strike\nWhenever Brazen Collector attacks, add {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
flavorText: Risks taken to retrieve a prize only increase its value.

name: Conduct Electricity
originalText: Conduct Electricity deals 6 damage to target creature and 2 damage to up to one target creature token.
flavorText: "Give me a lightning rod, something I can use as a channel!" Ral called above the mayhem. Nodding, Finneas drew a copperleaf arrow from his emptying quiver and shot.

originalText: Haste\nWhenever a player casts their second spell each turn, Hearthborn Battler deals 2 damage to target opponent.

name: Manifold Mouse

originalText: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. It also gets +1/+0 until end of turn if you control a Mouse.\nDraw a card.

name: Playful Shove
originalText: Playful Shove deals 1 damage to any target.\nDraw a card.

name: Quaketusk Boar
originalText: Reach, trample, haste
flavorText: "Calamity Beasts are running through Valley, leaving death and destruction in their wake. I have a plan to stop them."\n—Glarb, ruler of Fountainport

name: Rabid Gnaw
originalText: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavorText: Unbeknownst to the hosts, the foraged seeds they served at dinner had been touched by a Calamity Beast. The results were ... disturbing.

name: Raccoon Rallier
originalText: {T}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

originalText: Trample\nWhen Reptilian Recruiter enters, choose target creature. If that creature's power is 2 or less or if you control another Lizard, gain control of that creature until end of turn, untap it, and it gains haste until end of turn.

originalText: As this artifact enters, choose a creature type. This artifact enters with a fellowship counter on it for each creature you control of the chosen type.\nCreatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each fellowship counter on this artifact.

name: Leyline Axe

name: Scrawling Crawler
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card.\nWhenever an opponent draws a card, that player loses 1 life.
flavorText: It spreads the machine gospel of New Phyrexia, its task incomplete until all surrender to perfection.

name: Soulstone Sanctuary
originalText: {T}: Add {C}.\n{4}: This land becomes a 3/3 creature with vigilance and all creature types. It's still a land.
flavorText: By tradition, travelers touched the pillar for good luck. One day, it decided to travel as well.

name: Adamant Will
originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavorText: "I refuse to die before I see the sun rise again."

name: Ancestor Dragon
originalText: Flying\nWhenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

name: Angelic Edict
originalText: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavorText: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

name: Bishop's Soldier
originalText: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavorText: Vampires, the noble class of old Torrezon, are guided by their dual loyalties to church and crown.

name: Deadly Riposte
originalText: Deadly Riposte deals 3 damage to target tapped creature and you gain 2 life.

name: Elspeth's Smite
originalText: Elspeth's Smite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Herald of Faith
originalText: Flying\nWhenever this creature attacks, you gain 2 life.
flavorText: The clerics prayed for salvation. The soldiers prayed for victory. Both prayers were answered.

name: Ingenious Leonin
originalText: {3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking creature you control. If that creature is a Cat, it gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Inspiring Overseer
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavorText: The angels were determined to show a city run by demons that there was a better path.

name: Jazal Goldmane
originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\n{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

name: Leonin Skyhunter
originalText: Flying
flavorText: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

name: Leonin Vanguard
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

name: Moment of Triumph
originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavorText: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"

name: Pacifism
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavorText: "If only they'd all act this docile. I could do something relaxing for a living. I've always wanted to bake biscuits."\n—Ethuk, Coppercoat mage

name: Prayer of Binding
originalText: Flash\nWhen this enchantment enters, exile up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
flavorText: "We do not make martyrs of villains. We leave them and their vile ideologies to be forgotten."\n—Lyra Dawnbringer

name: Twinblade Paladin
originalText: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.\nAs long as you have 25 or more life, this creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Burrog Befuddler
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

name: Cancel
originalText: Counter target spell.
flavorText: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Corsair Captain
originalText: When this creature enters, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")\nOther Pirates you control get +1/+1.
flavorText: "Lungs full of sea air and a hold full of loot. Ah, what a life!"

name: Eaten by Piranhas
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature loses all abilities and is a black Skeleton creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other colors, card types, and creature types.)

name: Exclusion Mage
originalText: When this creature enters, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavorText: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

originalText: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nReturn target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

name: Kitesail Corsair
originalText: This creature has flying as long as it's attacking.

name: Mystic Archaeologist
originalText: {3}{U}{U}: Draw two cards.

originalText: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)\nDraw a card.

name: Quick Study
originalText: Draw two cards.

name: Starlight Snare
originalText: Enchant creature\nWhen this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Storm Fleet Spy
originalText: Raid — When this creature enters, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.
flavorText: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

name: Bloodtithe Collector
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, if an opponent lost life this turn, each opponent discards a card.

name: Cemetery Recruitment
originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

name: Crossway Troublemakers
originalText: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by those creatures also causes their controller to gain that much life.)\nWhenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

originalText: Choose one —\n• Destroy target creature or planeswalker.\n• Return target Zombie creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

originalText: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Highborn Vampire
flavorText: With the bloodchiefs annihilated in the fight between the free and enthralled, the swamps around Malakir are full of dangerous, young vampires eager to make their marks.

name: Maalfeld Twins
originalText: When this creature dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

name: Moment of Craving
originalText: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Offer Immortality
originalText: Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavorText: "Give all you are to Phyrexia, and you will receive more than you could have ever desired."

name: Skeleton Archer
originalText: When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."\n—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Suspicious Shambler
originalText: {4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: It was the perfect disguise—at least until its stomach started moaning.

name: Undying Malice
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."

name: Untamed Hunger
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavorText: "Mindlessness is not weakness. When we are lost to hunger we are unstoppable."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Vampire Interloper
originalText: Flying\nThis creature can't block.

name: Vampire Neonate
originalText: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Vampire Spawn
originalText: When this creature enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: Unsuccessful vampire hunters often wind up as ravenous spawn.

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

originalText: Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.\n{R}: Until end of turn, another target Goblin you control gains flying and "When this creature deals combat damage, sacrifice it."

name: Fire Elemental
flavorText: "The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."\n—Jaya Ballard

name: Goblin Oriflamme
originalText: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

name: Goblin Smuggler
originalText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)\n{T}: Another target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

name: Kargan Dragonrider
originalText: As long as you control a Dragon, this creature has flying.

name: Kindled Fury
originalText: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Raging Redcap
originalText: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Rapacious Dragon
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Skyraker Giant
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

name: Swab Goblin

originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nOther creatures you control have trample.
flavorText: "Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."\n—Vivien Reid

name: Bear Cub
flavorText: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.\n—Elvish saying

originalText: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

originalText: Enchant land\nWhen this Aura enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.\nEnchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nTrample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Thornweald Archer
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

originalText: {1}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

originalText: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

originalText: Flash\n{7}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy target permanent.

originalText:

originalText: Flying\n{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

originalText: Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Linden, the Steadfast Queen
originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nWhenever a white creature you control attacks, you gain 1 life.

originalText: Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

originalText: Other Cats you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink. (Damage dealt by those creatures also causes you to gain that much life.)\nWhen this creature enters, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.

name: Stasis Snare
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this enchantment enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nWhenever Syr Alin attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Flashfreeze

originalText: Whenever a Gate you control enters, this creature can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

originalText: You may cast this card as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: River's Rebuke

This spell can't be countered.

originalText: Flying\nThis creature gets +1/+0 for each basic Island you control.

name: Unsummon

name: Voracious Greatshark
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, counter target artifact or creature spell.

name: Deathmark
originalText: Destroy target green or white creature.

name: Abuelo's Awakening
originalText: Return target artifact or non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it. It's a 1/1 Spirit creature with flying in addition to its other types.
flavorText: Quintorius touched the old poncho he'd found. A rush of magic condensed into an Echo, and wise Abuelo stepped forth.

name: Acrobatic Leap
originalText: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavorText: As the cliff began to crumble, Wayta danced fearlessly across the tumbling stones, knowing Ajij would never let her fall.

name: Adaptive Gemguard
originalText: Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Adaptive Gemguard. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: Left their own devices, gnomes reengineer their own devices.

name: Attentive Sunscribe
originalText: Whenever Attentive Sunscribe becomes tapped, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavorText: Few humans are steady-handed enough to match a gnome's precision. Even the slightest change to a single line can wildly alter a glyph's meaning.

name: Bat Colony
originalText: When Bat Colony enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying for each mana from a Cave spent to cast it.\nWhenever a Cave enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

name: Clay-Fired Bricks // Cosmium Kiln
flavorText: "I love the smell of freshly baked gnomes!"\n—Yelha, Oltec artisan

name: Cosmium Blast
originalText: Cosmium Blast deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavorText: Cosmium is the tangible essence of Chimil's power. The Oltec's cosmium-laced tattoos ensure that power can be called upon when needed.

name: Dauntless Dismantler
originalText: Artifacts your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.\n{X}{X}{W}, Sacrifice Dauntless Dismantler: Destroy each artifact with mana value X.
flavorText: To their dismay, Brazen Coalition explorers soon found that the Oltec were not impressed by cannons.

name: Deconstruction Hammer
originalText: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Deconstruction Hammer: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavorText: "All that is made can be unmade. Chimil's light is the only constant."\n—Oltec artificers' creed

name: Dusk Rose Reliquary
originalText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.\nWard {2}\nWhen Dusk Rose Reliquary enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Dusk Rose Reliquary leaves the battlefield.

name: Envoy of Okinec Ahau
originalText: {4}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
flavorText: Though wary of each other at first, the Malamet and the Oltec found a common enemy in the mycoids. They began to share glyph knowledge and other crafting secrets.

name: Fabrication Foundry
originalText: {T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast an artifact spell or activate an ability of an artifact source.\n{2}{W}, {T}, Exile one or more other artifacts you control with total mana value X: Return target artifact card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Family Reunion

name: Get Lost
originalText: Destroy target creature, enchantment, or planeswalker. Its controller creates two Map tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

name: Glorifier of Suffering
originalText: When Glorifier of Suffering enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

name: Guardian of the Great Door
originalText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap four untapped artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control.\nFlying
flavorText: The Core was sealed long ago by the Deep Gods, who set the angels to the eternal task of defending its golden gates.

name: Helping Hand
originalText: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

name: Ironpaw Aspirant
originalText: When Ironpaw Aspirant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Miner's Guidewing

originalText: Flash\nWhen Mischievous Pup enters the battlefield, return up to one other target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

name: Ojer Taq, Deepest Foundation // Temple of Civilization

flavorText: Chimil gave the Oltec life. Ojer Taq taught them how to live together.

name: Oltec Archaeologists
originalText: When Oltec Archaeologists enters the battlefield, choose one —\n• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.\n• Scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Oltec Cloud Guard
originalText: Flying\nWhen Oltec Cloud Guard enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
flavorText: Many Oltec youth dream of one day joining the elite bat-riding cavalry of the Thousand Moons military force.

name: Oteclan Landmark // Oteclan Levitator

name: Petrify

name: Quicksand Whirlpool
originalText: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.\nExile target creature.

name: Ruin-Lurker Bat
originalText: Flying, lifelink\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, scry 1. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)

name: Soaring Sandwing
originalText: Flying\nWhen Soaring Sandwing enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.\nPlainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

originalText: Whenever Thousand Moons Crackshot attacks, you may pay {2}{W}. When you do, tap target creature.

name: Thousand Moons Infantry
originalText: Untap Thousand Moons Infantry during each other player's untap step.

name: Thousand Moons Smithy // Barracks of the Thousand
Thousand Moons Smithy // Barracks of the Thousand
Tinker's Tote
originalText: When Tinker's Tote enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.\n{W}, Sacrifice Tinker's Tote: You gain 3 life.

originalText: {1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Vanguard of the Rose gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Warden of the Inner Sky
originalText: As long as Warden of the Inner Sky has three or more counters on it, it has flying and vigilance.\nTap three untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Warden of the Inner Sky. Scry 1. Activate only as a sorcery.

flavorText: "These lost children of Aclazotz are misguided, but perhaps there can be reconciliation of our ideals without war."

name: Ancestral Reminiscence
originalText: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavorText: A typical conversation with Echoes is three parts wisdom and one part gossip.

name: Brackish Blunder

name: Braided Net // Braided Quipu

name: Chart a Course
originalText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

name: Cogwork Wrestler
originalText: Flash\nWhen Cogwork Wrestler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavorText: Years of adventure and adversity on the open seas did not prepare Brog for the humiliation of losing a sparring match to a cogwork doll less than half his size.

name: Confounding Riddle
originalText: Choose one —\n• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\n• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

originalText: Whenever one or more nontoken Merfolk you control become tapped, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof.

name: Didact Echo

The Enigma Jewel // Locus of Enlightenment

Frilled Cave-Wurm

Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Inverted Iceberg // Iceberg Titan
flavorText: The force of a blizzard. The rage of a monstrosaur.

For as long as Kitesail Larcenist remains on the battlefield, the chosen permanents become Treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color" and lose all other abilities.

originalText: Flash\nFlying\nWhenever Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel deals combat damage to a player, put a chorus counter on it. Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are four or more chorus counters on Malcolm, you may cast the discarded card without paying its mana cost.

name: Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch // Temple of Cyclical Time
Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch // Temple of Cyclical Time
flavorText: Chimil gave the Oltec time. Ojer Pakpatiq gave them the tools to learn its lessons.

originalText: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature spell.\nCounter target spell.
flavorText: "The Core is not a simple trove to be plundered by intruders from the surface. It will reject those who do not accord it respect."\n—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan

originalText: When Sage of Days enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put one of those cards back on top of your library. Put the rest into your graveyard.

originalText: When Abyssal Gorestalker enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices two creatures.

originalText: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Fanatical Offering

Flash
Enchant creature

name: Grasping Shadows // Shadows' Lair

name: Greedy Freebooter

flavorText: Aclazotz laughed as the dark shards closed around Chimil, plunging the Core into unnatural darkness. At long last, his bloody reign would begin.

name: Mephitic Draught
originalText: When Mephitic Draught enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Preacher of the Schism

name: Primordial Gnawer
originalText: When Primordial Gnawer dies, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Queen's Bay Paladin

name: Rampaging Spiketail

name: Thrashing Brontodon
originalText: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: "I suppose we'll just hope those ancient monoliths lost to our people for centuries weren't particularly important."\n—Toxayac, Sun Empire historian

name: Walk with the Ancestors
originalText: Return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Discover 4. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Abuelo, Ancestral Echo
originalText: Flying, ward {2}\n{1}{W}{U}: Exile another target creature or artifact you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavorText: "Come, friends. Let us see if this world remembers us."

name: Akawalli, the Seething Tower
originalText: Descend 4 — As long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, Akawalli, the Seething Tower gets +2/+2 and has trample.\nDescend 8 — As long as there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard, Akawalli gets an additional +2/+2 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Amalia Benavides Aguirre
originalText: Ward—\nPay 3 life.\nWhenever you gain life, Amalia Benavides Aguirre explores. Then destroy all other creatures if its power is exactly 20. (To have this creature explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: The Ancient One
originalText: Descend 8 — The Ancient One can't attack or block unless there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard.\n{2}{U}{B}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a card this way, target player mills cards equal to its mana value.

name: Anim Pakal, Thousandth Moon
originalText: Whenever you attack with one or more non-Gnome creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on Anim Pakal, then create X 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Anim Pakal.
flavorText: "If we are to protect this world, we can no longer hide within it!"

name: Bartolomé del Presidio
originalText: Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bartolomé del Presidio.
flavorText: "Bless this sinner, who sacrificed his blood so that I may live."

name: The Belligerent
originalText: Whenever The Belligerent attacks, create a Treasure token. Until end of turn, you may look at the top card of your library any time, and you may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.\nCrew 3

name: Caparocti Sunborn
originalText: Whenever Caparocti Sunborn attacks, you may tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control. If you do, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Captain Storm, Cosmium Raider
originalText: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Pirate you control.
flavorText: "To the mother lode, and death take the wary!"

name: Deepfathom Echo
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Deepfathom Echo explores. Then you may have it become a copy of another creature you control until end of turn. (To have this creature explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Gishath, Sun's Avatar
originalText: Vigilance, trample, haste\nWhenever Gishath, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Itzquinth, Firstborn of Gishath
originalText: Haste\nWhen Itzquinth, Firstborn of Gishath enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}. When you do, target Dinosaur you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.
flavorText: "Dinosaurs have no concept of royalty, but they recognize the scent of the mightiest among them."\n—Atla Palani, nest tender

name: Kutzil, Malamet Exemplar
originalText: Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.\nWhenever one or more creatures you control each with power greater than its base power deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavorText: "Invaders in the West Chasm? Give me an hour and they'll be fungus food."

name: Master's Guide-Mural // Master's Manufactory
flavorText: "The Fomori are a foul and distant memory, but their war machines taught us much about large-scale armorcraft."\n—Anim Pakal, Thousandth Moon

name: Molten Collapse
originalText: Choose one. If you descended this turn, you may choose both instead. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)\n• Destroy target creature or planeswalker.\n• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.

name: The Mycotyrant
originalText: Trample\nThe Mycotyrant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control that are Fungi and/or Saprolings.\nAt the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 black Fungus creature tokens with "This creature can't block," where X is the number of times you descended this turn. (You descend each time a permanent card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.)

name: Nicanzil, Current Conductor
originalText: Whenever a creature you control explores a land card, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.\nWhenever a creature you control explores a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on Nicanzil, Current Conductor.
flavorText: "This water can guide you anywhere, if you know how to ask."

name: Palani's Hatcher
originalText: Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.\nWhen Palani's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 green Dinosaur Egg creature tokens.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control one or more Eggs, sacrifice an Egg, then create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token.

name: Quintorius Kand
originalText:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, Quintorius Kand deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.
+1: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
−3: Discover 4.
−6: Exile any number of target cards from your graveyard. Add {R} for each card exiled this way. You may play those cards this turn.

name: Saheeli, the Sun's Brilliance
originalText: {U}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature or artifact you control, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavorText: What began as a single gift for Huatli became a battalion of automatons unlike anything ever seen on Ixalan.

name: Sovereign Okinec Ahau
originalText: Ward {2}\nWhenever Sovereign Okinec Ahau attacks, for each creature you control with power greater than that creature's base power, put a number of +1/+1 counters on that creature equal to the difference.
flavorText: As surface empires send their explorers down, his hungry eyes look upward.

name: Squirming Emergence
originalText: Fathomless descent — Return to the battlefield target nonland permanent card in your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of permanent cards in your graveyard.
flavorText: Due to archaic Brazen Coalition guidelines regarding hats, a few mycoids are now technically pirate captains.

name: Uchbenbak, the Great Mistake
originalText: Vigilance, menace\nDescend 8 — {4}{U}{B}: Return Uchbenbak, the Great Mistake from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. Activate only if there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard and only as a sorcery. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

name: Vito, Fanatic of Aclazotz
originalText: Flying\nWhenever you sacrifice another permanent, you gain 2 life if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, each opponent loses 2 life. If it's the third time, create a 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying.

Descend 8 — Choose one. If there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard as you cast this spell, choose one or more instead.

flavorText: "Dragons working alongside the Abzan, not as overlords but as equals. It feels like a dream."\n—Anafenza

name: Auroral Procession
originalText: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: The Temur celebrate the end of the Unbroken Night with stories, dances, and feasts. They gather to witness the first light of dawn as the land sings in harmony.

name: Awaken the Honored Dead
originalText:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target nonland permanent.
II — Mill three cards.
III — You may discard a card. When you do, return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Barrensteppe Siege
originalText: As this enchantment enters, choose Abzan or Mardu.\n• Abzan — At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.\n• Mardu — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.

name: Betor, Kin to All
originalText: Flying\nAt the beginning of your end step, if creatures you control have total toughness 10 or greater, draw a card. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 20 or greater, untap each creature you control. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 40 or greater, each opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

name: Bone-Cairn Butcher

flavorText: In power, in hunger, in cruelty—insatiable.

name: Call the Spirit Dragons
originalText: Dragons you control have indestructible.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, for each color, put a +1/+1 counter on a Dragon you control of that color. If you put +1/+1 counters on five Dragons this way, you win the game.

name: Cori Mountain Stalwart
originalText: Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

name: Death Begets Life
originalText: Destroy all creatures and enchantments. Draw a card for each permanent destroyed this way.
flavorText: "You need not mourn. Their life essence has returned to the earth, where it will eventually bloom into a new form."\n—Kotis, the Fangkeeper

name: Defibrillating Current
originalText: Defibrillating Current deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: A small shock to save a life, a large one to take it away.\n—Mardu healer's adage

name: Disruptive Stormbrood // Petty Revenge
originalText: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less. (Then shuffle this card into its owner's library.)

name: Dragonback Assault
originalText: When this enchantment enters, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.\nLandfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Dragonclaw Strike
originalText: Double the power and toughness of target creature you control until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Flash

name: Hardened Tactician
originalText: {1}, Sacrifice a token: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Life is full of tough calls. We honor the dead today to make better decisions tomorrow."\n—Uruna, Mardu lieutenant

name: Hollowmurk Siege
originalText: As this enchantment enters, choose Sultai or Abzan.\n• Sultai — Whenever a counter is put on a creature you control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.\n• Abzan — Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature. It gains menace until end of turn.

flavorText: "Life ensures death. Death ensures life. Yet always I remain. Perhaps an abiding harvest needs an ageless shepherd."\n—Ugin

name: Narset, Jeskai Waymaster
flavorText: With no dragonlord to hold her back, she was free to learn every secret Ugin left behind.

name: Skirmish Rhino
flavorText: Slowly, with or without Ugin's help, the clans are recovering and adapting long-forgotten tactics.

name: Static Snare
originalText: Flash\nThis spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature.\nWhen this enchantment enters, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

name: Roiling Dragonstorm
originalText: When this enchantment enters, draw two cards, then discard a card.\nWhen a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.
flavorText: "Beware dragonstorms that strike from the sea. Their size always disguises their force."\n—Narset

name: Strategic Betrayal
originalText: Target opponent exiles a creature they control and their graveyard.
flavorText: As Sultai blades threatened Qatros city walls, Mehtma of House Fenzala turned her weapons on her political rivals.

name: Channeled Dragonfire
originalText: Channeled Dragonfire deals 2 damage to any target.\nHarmonize {5}{R}{R}

name: Encroaching Dragonstorm
originalText: When this enchantment enters, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nWhen a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

name: Temur Battlecrier
originalText: During your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
flavorText: When called to the land's defense, all come to protect their shared home. It's why many of the Temur use "family" and "herd" interchangeably.

name: Qarsi Revenant
originalText: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink\nRenew — {2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a flying counter, a deathtouch counter, and a lifelink counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: "Evil wears many faces. Keep your windows closed at night, or it might wear yours."\n—Sultai warning
